titles.title: Higher Lord, Take Us Higher Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Higher Lord, take us higher Lord;
That we might see Thy face.
Receive the fullness of Thy grace.
That we might rest in Thee, and set creation free.
O Lord, take us higher.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Deeper Lord, take us deeper Lord
That we might see Thy face.
Receive the fullness of Thy grace.
That we might rest in Thee, and set creation free.
O Lord, take us deeper

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Llevanos, mas alto Dios.
Tu rostro quiero ver.
Eceremos
Plena recibir.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Para en ti descansar, la creacion librar.
Oh Se√±or, llevanos, mas alto.
